description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任中共安徽省委书记、中共宁夏回族自治区党委书记等职。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, who served as Secretary of the Anhui Provincial Committee of the CCP and Secretary of the Ningxia Hui Autonomous Regional Committee of the CCP.

nodes.id: 中国共产党宁夏回族自治区委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党宁夏回族自治区委员会
中共宁夏回族自治区党委

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在宁夏回族自治区的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Chinese Communist Party in the Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任宁夏回族自治区人民政府主席。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as Chairman of the People's Government of Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，黄璜的前任中共宁夏回族自治区党委书记。
description.en: A Chinese politician and the predecessor of Huang Huang as the Party Secretary of Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，黄璜的继任中共宁夏回族自治区党委书记。
description.en: A Chinese politician and the successor of Huang Huang as the Party Secretary of Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region.

nodes.id: 中国共产党安徽省委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党安徽省委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在安徽省的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Chinese Communist Party in Anhui Province.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国江苏省淮安市下辖的县。
description.en: A county under the jurisdiction of Huai'an City, Jiangsu Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党望江县委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党望江县委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在望江县的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Chinese Communist Party in Wangjiang County.

nodes.id: 中国共产党六安地区委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党六安地区委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在六安地区的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Chinese Communist Party in Lu'an Prefecture.

nodes.id: 中国共产党霍邱县委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党霍邱县委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在霍邱县的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Chinese Communist Party in Huoqiu County.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国江西省的省级国家行政机关。
description.en: The provincial-level state administrative organ of Jiangxi Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，黄璜的前任中共安徽省委书记。
description.en: A Chinese politician and the predecessor of Huang Huang as the Party Secretary of Anhui.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，黄璜的继任中共安徽省委书记。
description.en: A Chinese politician and the successor of Huang Huang as the Party Secretary of Anhui.

description.zh-cn: 黄璜出生于江苏省涟水县。
description.en: Huang Huang was born in Lianshui County, Jiangsu Province.

description.zh-cn: 黄璜是中国共产党党员。
description.en: Huang Huang is a member of the Chinese Communist Party.

relationships.target: 中国共产党望江县委员会

description.zh-cn: 1960年，黄璜担任中共望江县委书记处书记。
description.en: In 1960, Huang Huang served as Secretary of the Secretariat of the Wangjiang County Committee of the CCP.

relationships.target: 中国共产党六安地区委员会

description.zh-cn: 自1980年起，黄璜担任中共六安地委常委、副书记。
description.en: Starting in 1980, Huang Huang served as a Standing Committee Member and Deputy Secretary of the Lu'an Prefectural Committee of the CCP.

relationships.target: 中国共产党霍邱县委员会

description.zh-cn: 自1980年起，黄璜担任霍邱县委第一书记。
description.en: Starting in 1980, Huang Huang served as the First Secretary of the Huoqiu County Committee of the CCP.

relationships.target: 中国共产党安徽省委员会

description.zh-cn: 1984年12月至1986年4月，黄璜担任中共安徽省委书记（当时设有第一书记）。
description.en: From December 1984 to April 1986, Huang Huang served as Secretary of the Anhui Provincial Committee of the CCP (at that time, the position of First Secretary also existed).

description.zh-cn: 1987年，黄璜担任江西省人民政府副省长。
description.en: In 1987, Huang Huang served as Vice Governor of Jiangxi Provincial People's Government.

relationships.target: 中国共产党宁夏回族自治区委员会

description.zh-cn: 1989年12月至1997年8月，黄璜担任中共宁夏回族自治区党委书记。
description.en: From December 1989 to August 1997, Huang Huang served as Secretary of the Ningxia Hui Autonomous Regional Committee of the CCP.

position.zh-cn: 宁夏回族自治区人民政府主席
position.en: Chairman of the People's Government of Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region

description.zh-cn: 在黄璜担任中共宁夏回族自治区党委书记期间，白立忱担任宁夏回族自治区人民政府主席，是黄璜的副职。
description.en: While Huang Huang was the Party Secretary of Ningxia, Bai Lichen was the Chairman of the regional government, serving as Huang's deputy.

description.zh-cn: 职务交接关系：黄璜接替沈达人担任中共宁夏回族自治区党委书记。
description.en: Job succession relationship: Huang Huang succeeded Shen Daren as the Party Secretary of Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region.

description.zh-cn: 职务交接关系：毛如柏接替黄璜担任中共宁夏回族自治区党委书记。
description.en: Job succession relationship: Mao Rubai succeeded Huang Huang as the Party Secretary of Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region.

description.zh-cn: 职务交接关系：黄璜接替周子健担任中共安徽省委书记。
description.en: Job succession relationship: Huang Huang succeeded Zhou Zijian as the Party Secretary of Anhui Province.

description.zh-cn: 职务交接关系：李贵鲜接替黄璜担任中共安徽省委书记。
description.en: Job succession relationship: Li Guixian succeeded Huang Huang as the Party Secretary of Anhui Province.
